bibl.title: Two Demotic Ostraca from (Τά Μεμνόνεα) [sic].
bibl.note: 1. O. Cair. Inv. 50453. An Early Roman receipt of the weavers' tax. 17 December, 3 BC. - 2. Inv. 51240. An early Roman receipt of two amounts of wheat. 2nd year of Tiberius.
bibl.seg: Maha Akeel, Two Demotic Ostraca from (Τά Μεμνόνεα) [sic].
Fayza Haikal (ed.), Mélanges offerts à Ola el-Aguizy = Bibliothèque d'étude. 164 (Le Caire, 2015) pp. 27-33, 1 tabl., 1 pl.
1. O. Cair. Inv. 50453. An Early Roman receipt of the weavers' tax. 17 December, 3 BC. - 2. Inv. 51240. An early Roman receipt of two amounts of wheat. 2nd year of Tiberius.
